timeline.message: * Make payment method pager always low res when cuotas v2 experiments is present

[feature] cuotas v2 experiment always low res
* Added tracking of no conditional experiments

[feature] apply variant cuotas v2 (#2370)

* Added component cuotas v2

[feature] add tracking of no conditional experiments

[feature] hide discount brief when scrolled installments experiment is present (#2376)

timeline.bodyText: tracking_mode no debería estar en camel?
timeline.author: guchito9
guchito9
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+package com.mercadopago.android.px.internal.datasource
+
+import android.content.SharedPreferences
+import com.google.gson.reflect.TypeToken
+import com.mercadopago.android.px.addons.model.internal.Configuration
+import com.mercadopago.android.px.addons.model.internal.Experiment
+import com.mercadopago.android.px.internal.repository.ExperimentsRepository
+import com.mercadopago.android.px.internal.util.JsonUtil
+import java.util.ArrayList
+
+private const val PREF_EXPERIMENTS = "PREF_EXPERIMENTS"
+
+class ExperimentsRepositoryImpl(private val sharedPreferences: SharedPreferences) : ExperimentsRepository {
+    private var internalExperiments: List<Experiment>? = null
+    override val experiments: List<Experiment>
+        get() {
+            if (internalExperiments == null) {
+                val type = object : TypeToken<List<Experiment?>?>() {}.type
+                internalExperiments = JsonUtil.fromJson<List<Experiment>>(
+                    sharedPreferences.getString(PREF_EXPERIMENTS, ArrayList<Experiment>().toString()), type)
+            }
+            return internalExperiments ?: ArrayList()

timeline.bodyText: Esto hay que dejar de hacerlo, sé que seguramente ya estaba así, pero yo lo cambiaría a hacer un remove de la key nomás
timeline.author: guchito9

timeline.bodyText: Yo ya empezaría a usar el @Parcelize

replies.bodyText: Es mas complejo en este caso porque la clase es abstract y los hijos tienen paramentros sin val/var en los constructores
replies.author: cgaggino

timeline.message:
[feature] track installments experiment conditionally (#2382)

* Added onPaymentExecuted event in pay button for tracking purpose
* Track when needed in pay button's integrations
* Added experiments in one tap's ConfirmEvent
* Check if there is a experiment to track.
